message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1150000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $1075000. It's a fair price that reflects the value you place on the product.
